reviews.title: Love it but.......
reviews.comment: I absolutely love this game, however I cannot stand that you cannot get more power ups without paying, and that you can only get one card per page. If these two things changed, I would rate it a 5. If the powerful thing doesn\'t change, I will just have to uninstall which sucks cause otherwise I would play it all the time.   Uuuggghh....thought I finally found a new one that I thought was fresh and new and fun...oh well....

reviews.comment: I takes between over 100 games to earn enough coins to buy \" 1 \" key. Powerups have to be purchased with real money. Occasionally you may be lucky enough to win one with a key. Also the XP\'s keep adding up HOWEVER, there\'s no when on the game to find out how many you have or what you do with them! ! I play this game when the other bingo apps are maxed out. Other bingo games that I play are awsome. I\'m giving this app a \"poor\
Cant see who im playing against, cant add friends without fb, shouldnt have to flip through cards when playing more than one.
